chapters.title: Chapter 3: The Ways of Honor
chapters.info: Nadere, p. 84—Wise One of the Goshien Aiel. She is almost stout, and has green eyes. She is as tall as most men. She is now traveling with the rest of the Goshien clan in Arad Doman. She and the other Wise Ones there are in charge of furthering Aviendha's training.
